_meanings:
{@--2@} (At the end of an adj.
<ab>comp.</ab>) Honouring or worshipping as
one's deity, as in {#sUryadEvatA janAH#}.

{@--3@} An idol. (The
word is said to be {%<ab>m.</ab>%} also, but is 

rarely used in that gender. 
Mammaṭa notices it as a fault called
{#aprayuktatva#}; see {#aprayukta#}).

{@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of the
third Kāṇḍa of Yāska's Nirukta.
